agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Administrative Process Act (APA) Regulatory Review Files
series_description: This series documents compliance with the Administrative
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after expiration, termination, rescission or replacement of regulation, or end of hearings if no regulation is issued, then destroy. (Authority: General Schedule 101).

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the handling and resolution of complaints filed with the Department. The series consists of correspondence, memoranda, appeals, corrective actions, and other pertinent materials.
retention_statement: Retain five years after resolution then destroy.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: Documents and Receipts File-Copies
retention_statement: Retain as long as administratively necessary then destroy in accordance with No. 8 on the schedule cover page. (Authority: General Schedule 102).

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents specific due process hearings, including hearing officer decisions, school division implementation plans, and implementation plan follow-ups.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after resolution then destroy.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the qualifications of hearing officers and complaints appeal reviewers who are appointed by the Virginia Supreme Court. This series consists of evaluations of hearing officers and complaint appeal reviewers, training certification, certification of competencies and recertification documentation.
retention_statement: Retain for 1 year after the individual is no longer certified/qualified to conduct due process hearings then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on the schedule cover page.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the tracking of the timelines for mediation, complaint investigations, due process hearings, corrective action plans, implementation plans, and annual plans.
retention_statement: Retain five years, then destroy.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series consists of the requests to view official records or retrieve information from official records and the agency response. Refer to
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after final action then destroy. (Authority: General Schedule 101).

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents administrative hearings not listed on another records retention schedule.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after last action then destroy.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents responses to questions regarding special education regulations and laws.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years then destroy.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series consists of the opinions requested by the agency, its officials, employees or departments, from the agency counsel or the Attorney General's office on matters of law.
retention_statement: Retain permanently. (Authority: General Schedule 101).

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series consists of a collection of informational, courtesy or general distribution copies of legal opinions.
retention_statement: Retain as long as administratively necessary then destroy. These are non-records per Virginia Public Records Act, and disposal reporting on Certificate of Records Disposal (RM-3 form) is not required. (Authority: General Schedule 101).

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Litigation Case Files – Agency Record Copy
series_description: This series documents status of legal cases involving the agency, its officials, employees, or departments. Includes litigation as a result of a due process hearing or complaint investigation and challenges to responses to FOIA requests.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after final disposition of the case, then destroy. (Authority: General Schedule 101).

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the internal control or management of a specific function of the agency.
retention_statement: Retain as long as administratively necessary then destroy. (Authoriity: General Schedule 101).

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the request for mediation, appointment of mediator, mediation reports, mediation closure report, and, in some cases, copy of agreement.
retention_statement: Retain five years, then destroy.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: Documents the internal guidelines, policies or instructions for the operation of an office or completion of a function.
retention_statement: Retain until superseded, obsolete or rescinded then destroy. (Authority: General Schedule 101).

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series consists of various items that are used in and for presentations by the agency.
retention_statement: Retain as long as administratively necessary then destroy. (Authority: General Schedule 101).

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the reimbursement of moneys to agency employees for approved expenditures.
retention_statement: Retain as long as administratively necessary then destroy. (Authority: General Schedule 102).

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series consists of the Special Education Annual Plans from each school division which are required to be filed by §22.1-215
retention_statement: Retain 5 years or until superseded, whichever is longer, then destroy.
legal_citation: Code of Virginia. The series documents actions specific to the creation of the annual plan, including department communications to school divisions and state operated programs, school division and SOP plans, and internal department communications regarding review and approval of the plans.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents internal staff meetings.
retention_statement: Retain as long as administratively necessary then destroy. (Authority: General Schedule 101).

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents incoming or outgoing telephone calls.
retention_statement: Retain 1 year after last entry then destroy. (Authority: General Schedule 101).

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the phone calls received by the office.
retention_statement: Retain 1 year then destroy. (Authority: General Schedule 101).
